name: Cute Buttons
description:
Never design a button from scratch again.


I created a Figma file packed with lots of buttons with components and variants. 


What? I created a Figma file that has more than 50 buttons in three different sizes and four different states. 


Why? I created this in order to help me faster my design process. Now I donâ€™t have to design buttons from scratch. Thank God!


The buttons come in three sizes: regular, large, and small. And for each size, there are four states pre-designed: default, hovered, pressed, and disabled.


The buttons are designed for apps and websites but not limited to those only, you can also use these in your social media posts, presentations, or anything in between.


Currently, the buttons are available for Figma users only, but the Adobe XD version is coming soon.
